title: He's set to decide this General Election, but who is the Workington man?
text:
The upcoming General Election will be a battle for the hearts and minds of the ‘Workington man’, a think tank has revealed.

According to new research Boris Johnson’s Dec 12 election will be won or lost based on “older, white male voters in Leave-backing northern towns”.

The Workington man, named after the Cumbrian town, has not been to university and comes from areas with strong links to rugby league.

The Onward study paints him as a man who prefers security over freedom and feels like the country is moving away from his views.

He sees crime and immigration as key issues at the next election and is seeking a strong Prime Minister.

The Workington man works in a lower managerial role or in a skilled...
description: The upcoming General Election will be a battle for the hearts and minds of the ‘Workington man’, a think tank has revealed.
